啑字的基本解释

啑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shà］
［《廣韻》所甲切，入狎，生。］
(1)水鸟或鱼类吃食。
(2)见“啑啑”。
(3)通“歃”。参见“啑血”。
[②]［dié］
［《字彙補》丁牒切］
通“喋2”。
[③]［jié］
［《集韻》即涉切，入葉，精。］
多言貌。

啑字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　啑； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页195第15
【廣韻】所甲切【集韻】【韻會】色甲切，?音翣。【玉篇】啑喋，鴨食也。亦作唼。【集韻】啑喋，水鳥食魚貌。　又【集韻】作答切，音帀。與?同。【左傳·僖二十八年】盬其腦。【註】啑也。【音義】啑，子答反。　又【集韻】所答切，音霎。又子洽切，音眨。義?同，?見【左傳·僖二十八年盬其腦音義】。　又【集韻】【類篇】?卽涉切，音接。多言也。　又【史記·呂後紀】始與高帝啑血盟。【註】索隱曰：啑，使接反。或作插。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shà］
[A cut in "Guangyun", enters 狎, and is born. ]
(1) Waterfowl or fish eat food.
(2) See "啑啑".
(3) Through "歃". See "Blood".
[②]［dié］
["Zihuibu" Ding Diqie]
Through "Chatter 2".
[③]［jié］
["Jiyun" refers to cutting, entering leaves, and refined. ]
Be more eloquent.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　啑; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 195 15
[Guang Yun] All Jiaqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Color Jiaqie,? Sound. [Jade articles] Chatter, duck food. Also for 唼. [Ji Yun] chattering, the appearance of water birds eating fish.　[Jiyun] Answers and cuts, with sound. Same as? [Twenty-eight years of Zuo Zhuan] Yan Qi Nao. [Note] Chuck too. [Pronunciation] Chuck, the child answered in the opposite direction.　[Jiyun] The answer is cut, the sound is instant. Youzi Qiaqie, the sound blinked. Righteousness? Same,? See [Zuozhuan·Xi 28th Year of the Brain Sound and Meaning].　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? She cuts, phonetic connects. Talk more.　[Historical Records·Lv Houji] The beginning of a blood alliance with Gao Di. [Note] Suo Yin said: Hey, make the connection reversed. Or for insertion.
